text: "Sausage Rolls for Everyone" is a 2021 Christmas song by LadBaby featuring Elton John and Ed Sheeran. It was released as a single on 17 December, 2021. It is a remix and comedy version of Merry Christmas by Ed Sheeran and Elton John. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and number 41 in Ireland. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Christmas songs
title: Sausage Rolls for Everyone
